name: PuckIt Lite
description:
(Windows and Mac available for download)

.

I WANT MORE LEVELS!!!!!

THEN HAVE MORE! PuckIt Deluxe (Currently not out yet) will have 36 unique levels... lots of collectables... stuff to do y'know. And it will be a whopping $1, so you may need to sell 30% of your liver to buy it. Sorry!!

Also... you may wanna join our discord where people post custom levels .... which doesn't cost extra money.

Wallpaper Album:

Do you like the backgrounds? Then have more of them for FREE as wallpapers! You can get them here,  there's a landscape and portrait version of each.

Here's a couple examples if you're not convinced:

Song Album: 

If you like the music there's also the soundtrack on YouTube you could listen to. 

Discord:

Got any custom levels to share? Share them on our discord! Also join if you're wanting regular updates about Puck It Deluxe or any other cool games. 

Twitter:

Discord can be a bit overwhelming, so if you just want casual updates about Puck It Deluxe or other cool stuff you can follow me on Twitter.
